CustomField.description: Positive amount in cents. The value of one of the micro-deposits as given by your customer. It can take a few days for the micro-deposit to appear in the customer's bank account. For "$0.32", enter 32. The order does not matter between the two fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Positive amount in cents. The value of one of the micro-deposits as given by your customer. It can take a few days for the micro-deposit to appear in the customer's bank account. For "$0.32", enter 32. The order does not matter between the two fields.
CustomField.label: Micro-Deposit Two
